00021 #pragma once

00027 #include <limits>

00031 // Classes to monitor iterative solver progress, check for convergence, etc.
00032 // Follows the implementation of Iteration in the ITL:
00033 //   http://www.osl.iu.edu/research/itl/doc/Iteration.html
00034 
00035 namespace cusp
00036 {
00096 template <typename Real>
00097 class default_monitor
00098 {
00099     public:
00114     template <typename Vector>
00115     default_monitor(const Vector& b, size_t iteration_limit = 500, Real relative_tolerance = 1e-5, Real absolute_tolerance = 0)
00116         : b_norm(cusp::blas::nrm2(b)),
00117           r_norm(std::numeric_limits<Real>::max()),
00118           iteration_limit_(iteration_limit),
00119           iteration_count_(0),
00120           relative_tolerance_(relative_tolerance),
00121           absolute_tolerance_(absolute_tolerance)
00122     {}
00123 
00126     void operator++(void) {  ++iteration_count_; } // prefix increment
00127 
00133     template <typename Vector>
00134     bool finished(const Vector& r)
00135     {
00136         r_norm = cusp::blas::nrm2(r);
00137         
00138         return converged() || iteration_count() >= iteration_limit();
00139     }
00140    
00143     bool converged() const
00144     {
00145         return residual_norm() <= tolerance();
00146     }
00147 
00150     Real residual_norm() const { return r_norm; }
00151 
00154     size_t iteration_count() const { return iteration_count_; }
00155 
00158     size_t iteration_limit() const { return iteration_limit_; }
00159 
00162     Real relative_tolerance() const { return relative_tolerance_; }
00163     
00166     Real absolute_tolerance() const { return absolute_tolerance_; }
00167    
00173     Real tolerance() const { return absolute_tolerance() + relative_tolerance() * b_norm; }
00174 
00175     protected:
00176     
00177     Real r_norm;
00178     Real b_norm;
00179     Real relative_tolerance_;
00180     Real absolute_tolerance_;
00181 
00182     size_t iteration_limit_;
00183     size_t iteration_count_;
00184 };
00185 
00194 template <typename Real>
00195 class verbose_monitor : public default_monitor<Real>
00196 {
00197     typedef cusp::default_monitor<Real> super;
00198 
00199     public:
00214     template <typename Vector>
00215     verbose_monitor(const Vector& b, size_t iteration_limit = 500, Real relative_tolerance = 1e-5, Real absolute_tolerance = 0)
00216         : super(b, iteration_limit, relative_tolerance, absolute_tolerance)
00217     {
00218         std::cout << "Solver will continue until ";
00219         std::cout << "residual norm " << super::tolerance() << " or reaching ";
00220         std::cout << super::iteration_limit() << " iterations " << std::endl;
00221         std::cout << "  Iteration Number  | Residual Norm" << std::endl;
00222     }
00223     
00224     template <typename Vector>
00225     bool finished(const Vector& r)
00226     {
00227         super::r_norm = cusp::blas::nrm2(r);
00228 
00229         std::cout << "       "  << std::setw(10) << super::iteration_count();
00230         std::cout << "       "  << std::setw(10) << std::scientific << super::residual_norm() << std::endl;
00231 
00232         if (super::converged())
00233         {
00234             std::cout << "Successfully converged after " << super::iteration_count() << " iterations." << std::endl;
00235             return true;
00236         }
00237         else if (super::iteration_count() >= super::iteration_limit())
00238         {
00239             std::cout << "Failed to converge after " << super::iteration_count() << " iterations." << std::endl;
00240             return true;
00241         }
00242         else
00243         {
00244             return false;
00245         }
00246     }
00247 };
00260 template <typename Real>
00261 class convergence_monitor : public default_monitor<Real>
00262 {
00263     typedef cusp::default_monitor<Real> super;
00264 
00265     public:
00281     cusp::array1d<Real,cusp::host_memory> residuals;
00282 
00283     template <typename Vector>
00284     convergence_monitor(const Vector& b, size_t iteration_limit = 500, Real relative_tolerance = 1e-5, Real absolute_tolerance = 0)
00285         : super(b, iteration_limit, relative_tolerance, absolute_tolerance)
00286     {
00287         residuals.reserve(iteration_limit);
00288     }
00289     
00290     template <typename Vector>
00291     bool finished(const Vector& r)
00292     {
00293         super::r_norm = cusp::blas::nrm2(r);
00294         residuals.push_back(super::r_norm);
00295 
00296         return super::converged() || super::iteration_count() >= super::iteration_limit();
00297     }
00298 
00299     void print(void)
00300     {
00301         std::cout << "Solver will continue until ";
00302         std::cout << "residual norm " << super::tolerance() << " or reaching ";
00303         std::cout << super::iteration_limit() << " iterations " << std::endl;
00304 
00305         std::cout << "Ran " << super::iteration_count();
00306         std::cout << " iterations with a final residual of ";
00307         std::cout << super::r_norm << std::endl;
00308 
00309         std::cout << "geometric convergence factor : " << geometric_rate() << std::endl;
00310         std::cout << "immediate convergence factor : " << immediate_rate() << std::endl;
00311         std::cout << "average convergence factor   : " << average_rate() << std::endl;
00312     }
00313 
00314     Real immediate_rate(void)
00315     {
00316         size_t num = residuals.size();  
00317         return residuals[num-1] / residuals[num-2]; 
00318     }
00319 
00320     Real geometric_rate(void)
00321     {
00322         size_t num = residuals.size();  
00323         return std::pow(residuals[num-1] / residuals[0], Real(1.0)/num); 
00324     }
00325 
00326     Real average_rate(void)
00327     {
00328         size_t num = residuals.size();  
00329         cusp::array1d<Real,cusp::host_memory> avg_vec(num-1);
00330         thrust::transform(residuals.begin() + 1, residuals.end(), residuals.begin(), avg_vec.begin(), thrust::divides<Real>());
00331         Real sum = thrust::reduce(avg_vec.begin(), avg_vec.end(), Real(0), thrust::plus<Real>());
00332         return sum / Real(avg_vec.size());
00333     }
00334 };
00338 } // end namespace cusp
